summary.span: 提供一个专用的 ，已使用 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 针对加载图像进行了优化。

span.span: Provides a specialized that is optimized for loading images using Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要是为了支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 语法，并为非 定义的位图加载引入了其他属性。 primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by . 实现 接口，以优化多个属性的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。Property changes can only occur during object initialization. 调用 ，通知初始化已开始，并 通知初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，属性更改将被忽略。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用 构造函数创建 对象将自动初始化并忽略属性更改。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 和代码中的 。The following code examples demonstrate how to use a in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-xaml[ImageElementExample#SimpleXAML2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml#simplexaml2)] [!code-csharp[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[ImageElementExample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成冻结 对象（或任何 对象）的可修改副本。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法会隐藏继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（它们可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

summary.span: 获取或设置将图像解码为的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.

value.span: 将图像解码为的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果同时设置了 ，则将忽略位图的纵横比。If is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored. 如果未设置 ，则纵横比保持不变。If is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 编解码器以本机方式将图像解码为指定的大小;其他编解码器将图像的原始大小解码，并将图像缩放到所需大小。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用代码设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property by using code. [!code-csharp[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/CSharp/BitmapImageProps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BitmapImageProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapImageProps/VB/BitmapImageProps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放后执行旋转。Rotation is performed after scaling. 这意味着，如果某个图像的 为 ，其 为10， 为5，则会生成一个宽度为5、高度为10的图像。This means that an image that has a of , a of 10, and of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 和代码来旋转图像。The following code example demonstrates how to rotate an image by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
